name: Sinner
description:
Look into the darkest corners of consciousness.
Find the way out of insanity.
Fight the most outspoken fears and contract with your mind.

Gameplay of the game originates from the shooters of the 90s. Explore locations, solve puzzles to go further. Look for a resource that replenishes your weapon. Run away from monsters in right time. The game contains elements of survival.

Features:
  • extremely gloomy horror atmosphere
  • unusual weapon arsenal
  • disgusting enemies
  • destructible obstacles
  • atmospheric soundtrack
